div.h4:
You have to brainstorm a lot of ideas for the exhibit along with the students. You have to come up with ideas for:
• What should be shown about the viking age in the exhibition
• How it should be shown
• Ways to participate in the exhibit.
div.h6: Write in the space below. Click "Enter", every time you have written an idea. While you are writing, you can see other students' ideas on the screen. Click on the text in the big area, when you are ready to brainstorm. Go to the next task, when you cannot come up with anymore ideas. You will automatically go on after 3 minutes.
